remarks: Version of ~ cdleme31id with simpler hypotheses.  TODO:  Fix comment. (Contributed by NM, 21-Apr-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cdlemg2id.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg2id.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg2id.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg2id.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg2id.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemg2idN $p |- ( ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H /\ F e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) /\ ( ( F ` P ) = Q /\ X e. B ) /\ P = Q ) -> ( F ` X ) = X ) $.
